task: Develop a basic 'Snake' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Ask your body'.
name: Serpent's Pulse

branding_data.short_description: Serpent's Pulse is a unique twist on the classic Snake game, integrating rhythm and movement for a dynamic experience.
branding_data.detailed_description: Serpent's Pulse reimagines the traditional Snake game by introducing a rhythm-based gameplay mechanic inspired by the oblique strategy 'Ask your body'. In this innovative version, players control a snake that moves to the beat of a pulsating soundtrack. Each beat represents a moment when the snake can change direction or speed, requiring players to sync their actions with the rhythm. The game challenges players to navigate through a vibrant, dynamic environment, collecting items to grow longer while avoiding obstacles and their own tail. The integration of rhythmic movement creates a meditative yet challenging experience, as players must feel the pulse and react instinctively to the music's tempo.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
